title: Regression: missing MIR for generic async fn across crates

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: AsyncAwait-Triaged
labels.description: Async-await issues that have been triaged during a working group meeting.

body:
I'm getting an ICE when running a nightly version of clippy on https://github.com/smol-rs/smol. I bisected nightly toolchains, and the problem is present in +nightly-2021-01-14, and absent in +nightly-2021-01-13. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (a62a76047 2021-01-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: a62a76047ea24aad7639f14eb3ce0e620b77bdb7 commit-date: 2021-01-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:1189:17: get_optimized_mir: missing MIR for `DefId(18:48 ~ async_executor[37d1]::{impl#4}::run::{closure#0})` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:958:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/new note: Clippy version: clippy 0.1.51 (a62a760 2021-01-13) query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `async_executor::Executor::<'a>::run::{closure#0}` #1 [layout_raw] computing layout of `[static generator@async_executor::Executor::run<(), futures_lite::future::Pending<()>>::{closure#0} for<'r, 's, 't0, 't1, 't2, 't3, 't4, 't5, 't6> {std::future::ResumeTy, &'r async_executor::Executor<'s>, futures_lite::future::Pending<()>, async_executor::Runner<'t0>, impl futures_lite::Future, futures_lite::future::Or, impl futures_lite::Future>, ()}]` end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error error: could not compile `smol` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:958:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 2: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 3: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 4: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 6: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::cstore_impl::provide_extern::optimized_mir 7: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 8: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 9: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 12: rustc_middle::ty::::generator_layout 13: rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutCx::layout_raw_uncached 14: rustc_middle::ty::layout::layout_raw 15: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::layout_raw>::compute 16: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 17: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 18: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 19: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 21: as rustc_target::abi::LayoutOf>::layout_of 22: as alloc::vec::spec_from_iter::SpecFromIter>::from_iter 23: as alloc::vec::spec_from_iter::SpecFromIter>::from_iter 24: rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutCx::layout_raw_uncached 25: rustc_middle::ty::layout::layout_raw 26: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::layout_raw>::compute 27: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 28: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 29: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 30: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 31: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 32: as rustc_target::abi::LayoutOf>::layout_of 33: ::run_pass 34: rustc_mir::transform::run_passes 35: rustc_mir::transform::optimized_mir 36: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::optimized_mir>::compute 37: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 38: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 39: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 40: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 41: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 42: ::check_fn 43: ::check_fn 44: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_fn 45: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 46: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_expr 47: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 48: as rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_block 53: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_block 54: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_expr 55: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_block 56: as
